name: bj-dvelimv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0)))

stmt.origin: bj-dvelimdv1(s0, s1, s2, wtru, w0, w1)
stmt.pretty: bj-dvelimdv1(s0, s1, s2, wtru, w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s2, wtru)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s2, wtru)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s2, wtru)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

comment: A version of ~ dvelim using the "nonfree" idiom. (Contributed by BJ, 20-Oct-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
